newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Royal Dutch/Shell begun.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Royal Dutch/Shell begun.

text.p: Deutsche Morgan Grenfell said on Friday it initiated coverage of Royal Dutch/Shell Transport Group with a buy rating.
-- Further details were not immediately available.
-- The ADR shares trading in New York was down 1-11/16 to 54-1/4.
